meanings.definition: The process of an area becoming more affluent and appealing to young urban professionals.
meanings.sent1: The yuppification of the downtown area led to new fancy cafes and boutiques.
meanings.sent2: Yuppification has brought in more upscale shops and restaurants to the once run-down neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The yuppification of the old town made it hard for the local diner to keep up with the avocado toast craze.
meanings.sent4: The yuppification of the city was like a wave of change, transforming the streets into trendy havens.
meanings.sent5: The yuppification process turned the neighborhood into a vibrant hub for young professionals.

meanings.definition: The act of transforming a neighborhood or community into a trendy and upscale area.
meanings.sent1: With the yuppification of the district, old buildings were renovated into chic lofts.
meanings.sent2: Yuppification often involves renovating old buildings and attracting trendy businesses.
meanings.sent3: The yuppification of the block turned the local pub into a hipster hangout.
meanings.sent4: The yuppification of the town was like a makeover, giving it a fresh and modern look.
meanings.sent5: The yuppification project aimed to make the area more appealing to young professionals.

meanings.definition: The trend of young professionals moving into and gentrifying a previously working-class neighborhood.
meanings.sent1: The yuppification of the area brought in new residents and higher property prices.
meanings.sent2: Yuppification often leads to an increase in property values due to demand from young professionals.
meanings.sent3: The yuppification of the suburb turned the local market into an organic food paradise.
meanings.sent4: The yuppification of the community was like a magnet for young professionals seeking a trendy lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The yuppification trend transformed the neighborhood into a sought-after location for young urbanites.
